text: Anriyum atu(k kuttattar) pumiyil aniyayamakap perumaiyatittuk kontu, "enkalai vita valimaiyil mikkavarkal yar?" Enru kurinarkal - avarkalaip pataitta allah niccayamaka avarkalai vita valimaiyil mikkavan enpatai avarkal kavanittirukka villaiya? Innum avarkal nam attatcikalai maruttavare iruntarkal
